 8398: otp71922_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp, MgMid) ->
 8399:     CTRL = self(),
 8400:     Mid = {deviceName, "ctrl"},
 8401:     RI = [
 8402: 	  {port,             2944},
 8403: 	  {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
 8404: 	  {encoding_config,  []},
 8405: 	  {transport_module, megaco_tcp}
 8406: 	 ],
 8407:     Tid = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000100","01101101"]},
 8408:     NR = fun(Cid, Rid) ->
 8409: 		 [otp71922_mgc_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid)]
 8410: 	 end,
 8411:     LocalConnectVerify     = ?otp71922_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 8412:     ServiceChangeReqVerify = ?otp71922_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 8413:     NotifyReqVerify        = ?otp71922_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(),
 8414:     NotifyReplyVerify      = ?otp71922_mgc_verify_notify_reply_fun(), 
 8415:     AckVerify              = ?otp71922_mgc_verify_ack_fun(), 
 8416:     DiscoVerify            = ?otp71922_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(), 
 8417:     EvSeq = [
 8418: 	     {debug, true},
 8419: 	     %% {megaco_trace, max}, 
 8420: 	     {megaco_trace, disable}, 
 8421: 	     megaco_start,
 8422: 	     {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 8423: 	     start_transport,
 8424: 	     listen,
 8425: 
 8426:              %% ANNOUNCE READY
 8427:              {trigger, fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
 8428: 
 8429: 	     {megaco_connect,  MgMid}, 
 8430: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_connect,       LocalConnectVerify},
 8431: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, ServiceChangeReqVerify},
 8432: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify},
 8433: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify},
 8434: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify},
 8435: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, request_timer,      1000},
 8436: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(1,1), []},
 8437: 
 8438: 	     {megaco_callback, [{handle_trans_ack,     3, AckVerify},
 8439: 				{handle_trans_request, 3, NotifyReqVerify},
 8440: 				{handle_trans_reply,   1, NotifyReplyVerify}]},
 8441: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_disconnect,    DiscoVerify},
 8442: 	     {sleep, 1000},
 8443: 	     megaco_stop_user,
 8444: 	     megaco_stop
 8445: 	    ],
 8446:     EvSeq.
 8447: 
 8448: 
 8449: otp71922_mgc_verify_handle_connect({handle_connect, CH, ?VERSION}) -> 
 8450:     i("received expected handle_connect with"
 8451:       "~n      CH: ~p"
 8452:       "~n      => force a 2 second sleep before return", [CH]),
 8453:     {ok, timer:seconds(2), CH, ok};
 8454: otp71922_mgc_verify_handle_connect(Else) ->
 8455:     e("otp71922_mgc_verify_handle_connect -> invalid handle-connect: "
 8456:       "~n      Extected: handle_connect"
 8457:       "~n      Received: ~p", [Else]),
 8458:     {error, Else, ok}.
 8459: 
 8460: otp71922_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid) ->
 8461:     fun(Ev) ->
 8462: 	    otp71922_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Ev, Mid)
 8463:     end.
 8464: 
 8465: otp71922_mgc_verify_service_change_req(
 8466:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}, Mid) ->
 8467:     i("otp71922_mgc_verify_service_change_req -> ok"
 8468:       "~n   AR: ~p", [AR]),
 8469:     case AR of
 8470: 	#'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CR]} ->
 8471: 	    case CR of
 8472: 		#'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} ->
 8473: 		    case Cmd of
 8474: 			{serviceChangeReq, 
 8475: 			 #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = [Tid],
 8476: 						 serviceChangeParms = Parms}} ->
 8477: 			    case Tid of
 8478: 				#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, 
 8479: 						id = ["root"]} ->
 8480: 				    case Parms of
 8481: 					#'ServiceChangeParm'{
 8482: 						 serviceChangeMethod = restart,
 8483: 						 serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} ->
 8484: 					    Reply = 
 8485: 						{discard_ack, 
 8486: 						 [otp71922_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, 1)]},
 8487: 					    {ok, AR, Reply};
 8488: 					_ ->
 8489: 					    Err = {invalid_SCP, Parms},
 8490: 					    ED = otp71922_err_desc(Parms),
 8491: 					    ErrReply = {discard_ack, 
 8492: 							ED},
 8493: 					    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 8494: 				    end;
 8495: 				_ ->
 8496: 				    Err = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 8497: 				    ED = otp71922_err_desc(Tid),
 8498: 				    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 8499: 				    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 8500: 			    end;
 8501: 			_ ->
 8502: 			    Err = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 8503: 			    ED = otp71922_err_desc(Cmd),
 8504: 			    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 8505: 			    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 8506: 		    end;
 8507: 		_ ->
 8508: 		    Err = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 8509: 		    ED = otp71922_err_desc(CR),
 8510: 		    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 8511: 		    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 8512: 	    end;
 8513: 	_ ->
 8514: 	    Err = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 8515: 	    ED = otp71922_err_desc(AR),
 8516: 	    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 8517: 	    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 8518:     end;
 8519: otp71922_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Else, _Mid) ->
 8520:     io:format("otp71922_mgc_verify_service_change_req -> unknown"
 8521: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 8522:     ED = otp71922_err_desc(Else),
 8523:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 8524:     {error, Else, ErrReply}.
 8525: 
 8526: otp71922_mgc_verify_notify_request_fun() ->
 8527:     fun(Ev) ->
 8528: 	    otp71922_mgc_verify_notify_request(Ev)
 8529:     end.
 8530: 
 8531: otp71922_mgc_verify_notify_request(
 8532:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}) ->
 8533:     io:format("otp71922_mgc_verify_notify_request -> ok"
 8534: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 8535:     case AR of
 8536: 	#'ActionRequest'{contextId = 1 = Cid, 
 8537: 			 commandRequests = [CR]} ->
 8538: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} = CR,
 8539: 	    {notifyReq, NR} = Cmd,
 8540: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID = [Tid],
 8541: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = OED,
 8542: 			     errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} = NR,
 8543: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [OE]} = OED,
 8544: 	    #'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} = OE,
 8545: 	    HandleAck = {handle_sloppy_ack, kalle},
 8546: 	    Reply = {HandleAck, 
 8547: 		     [otp71922_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, Tid)]},
 8548: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
 8549: 	#'ActionRequest'{contextId = 2 = Cid, 
 8550: 			 commandRequests = [CR]} ->
 8551: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} = CR,
 8552: 	    {notifyReq, NR} = Cmd,
 8553: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID = [Tid],
 8554: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = OED,
 8555: 			     errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} = NR,
 8556: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [OE]} = OED,
 8557: 	    #'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} = OE,
 8558: 	    Reply = {discard_ack, [otp71922_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, Tid)]},
 8559: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
 8560: 	_ ->
 8561: 	    ED = otp71922_err_desc(AR),
 8562: 	    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 8563: 	    {error, AR, ErrReply}
 8564:     end;
 8565: otp71922_mgc_verify_notify_request(Else) ->
 8566:     io:format("otp71922_mgc_verify_notify_request -> unknown"
 8567: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 8568:     ED = otp71922_err_desc(Else),
 8569:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 8570:     {error, Else, ErrReply}.
 8571:

 8672:     RI = [

 8675: 	  {encoding_config,  []},
 8676: 	  {transport_module, megaco_tcp}
 8677: 	 ],
 8678:     ServiceChangeReq = [otp71922_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, 1)],
 8679:     %% This is so that we can match notify request and reply
 8680:     Tid1 = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000001","01101101"]},
 8681:     Tid2 = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000010","01101101"]},
 8682:     Tid3 = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000011","01101101"]},
 8683:     NR = fun(Cid, Rid, Tid) ->
 8684: 		 [otp71922_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid)]
 8685: 	 end,
 8686:     ConnectVerify            = ?otp71922_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 8687:     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = ?otp71922_mg_verify_service_change_reply_fun(), 
 8688:     NotifyReqVerify          = ?otp71922_mg_verify_notify_req_fun(),
 8689:     NotifyReplyVerify        = ?otp71922_mg_verify_notify_reply_fun(), 
 8690:     EvSeq = [
 8691: 	     {debug, true},
 8692: 	     megaco_start,
 8693: 	     {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 8694: 	     start_transport,
 8695: 	     %% {megaco_trace, max},
 8696: 	     {megaco_trace, disable},
 8697: 	     {megaco_system_info, users},
 8698: 	     {megaco_system_info, connections},
 8699: 	     connect,
 8700: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify},
 8701: 	     megaco_connect,
 8702: 	     {megaco_cast, ServiceChangeReq, []},
 8703: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify}, 
 8704: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, ServiceChangeReplyVerify},
 8705: 	     {sleep, 1000},
 8706: 	     {megaco_system_info, users},
 8707: 	     {megaco_system_info, connections},
 8708: 	     {sleep, 1000},
 8709: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, auto_ack,           true},
 8710: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, trans_ack_maxcount, 10},
 8711: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, trans_req_maxcount, 10},
 8712: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, trans_timer,        1000},
 8713: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, trans_ack,          true},
 8714: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, trans_req,          true},
 8715: 	     {megaco_conn_info, all},
 8716: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(1,1,Tid1), []},
 8717: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(1,2,Tid2), []},
 8718: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(1,3,Tid3), []},
 8719: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify},
 8720: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify},
 8721: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify},
 8722: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, trans_timer,        120000},
 8723: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(2,1,Tid1), []},
 8724: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(2,2,Tid2), []},
 8725: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(2,3,Tid3), []},
 8726: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify},
 8727: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply,   NotifyReplyVerify},
 8728: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply,   NotifyReplyVerify},
 8729: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply,   NotifyReplyVerify},
 8730: 	     {sleep, 3000},
 8731: 	     megaco_stop_user,
 8732: 	     megaco_stop,
 8733: 	     {sleep, 1000}
 8734: 	    ],
 8735:     EvSeq.
 8736: 
 8737: otp71922_mg_verify_handle_connect({handle_connect, CH, ?VERSION}) -> 
 8738:     i("received expected handle_connect:"
 8739:       "~n      CH: ~p", [CH]),
 8740:     {ok, CH, ok};
 8741: otp71922_mg_verify_handle_connect(Else) ->
 8742:     e("otp71922_mg_verify_handle_connect -> received unexpected:"
 8743:       "~n      Expected: handle_connect"
 8744:       "~n      Received: ~p", [Else]),
 8745:     {error, Else, ok}.
 8746: 
 8747: otp71922_mg_verify_service_change_reply({handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, 
 8748: 					{ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
 8749:     case AR of
 8750: 	#'ActionReply'{commandReply = [SCR]} ->
 8751: 	    case SCR of
 8752: 		{serviceChangeReply,
 8753: 		 #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID = [Tid],
 8754: 				       serviceChangeResult = Res}} ->
 8755: 		    case Tid of
 8756: 			#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, 
 8757: 					id = ["root"]} ->
 8758: 			    case Res of
 8759: 				{serviceChangeResParms,
 8760: 				 #'ServiceChangeResParm'{
 8761: 				   serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid}} ->
 8762:                                     i("received expected handle_trans_reply "
 8763:                                       "(service change) with ok"
 8764:                                       "~n      AR: ~p", [AR]),
 8765: 				    {ok, AR, ok};
 8766: 				{Tag, Val} ->
 8767:                                     e("received expected handle_trans_reply "
 8768:                                       "(service change) with error"
 8769:                                       "~n      Tag: ~p"
 8770:                                       "~n      Val: ~p", [Tag, Val]),
 8771: 				    Err = {invalid_service_change_result, 
 8772: 					   Tag, Val},
 8773: 				    {error, Err, ok}
 8774: 			    end;
 8775: 			_ ->
 8776:                             e("received expected handle_trans_reply "
 8777:                               "(service change) with error"
 8778:                               "~n      Tid: ~p", [Tid]),
 8779: 			    Err = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 8780: 			    {error, Err, ok}
 8781: 		    end;
 8782: 		{Tag, Val} ->
 8783:                     e("received expected handle_trans_reply "
 8784:                       "(action reply) with error"
 8785:                       "~n      Tag: ~p"
 8786:                       "~n      Val: ~p", [Tag, Val]),
 8787: 		    Err = {invalid_command_reply, Tag, Val},
 8788: 		    {error, Err, ok}
 8789: 	    end;
 8790: 	_ ->
 8791:             e("received expected handle_trans_reply with error"
 8792:               "~n      AR: ~p", [AR]),
 8793: 	    Err = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
 8794: 	    {error, Err, ok}
 8795:     end;
 8796: otp71922_mg_verify_service_change_reply(Else) ->
 8797:     e("invalid service change reply:"
 8798:       "~n      Expected: handle_trans_reply"
 8799:       "~n      Received: ~p", [Else]),
 8800:     {error, Else, ok}.
 8801: 
 8802: otp71922_mg_verify_notify_reply({handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, 
 8803: 				{ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
 8804:     i("received expected handle_notify_reply -> ok"
 8805:       "~n      AR: ~p", [AR]),
 8806:     {ok, AR, ok};
 8807: otp71922_mg_verify_notify_reply(Else) ->
 8808:     e("otp71922_mg_verify_notify_reply -> invalid notify reply"
 8809:       "~n      Expected: handle_trans_reply with ok"
 8810:       "~n      Received: ~p", [Else]),
 8811:     {error, Else, ok}.
 8812: 
 8813: otp71922_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 8814:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 8815:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 8816:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 8817:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 8818:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 8819:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 8820:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 8821: 
 8822: otp71922_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
 8823:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
 8824:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 8825:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 8826:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 8827:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 8828:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 8829:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 8830:

 8833: %% Common functions for the multi_trans_req_timeout test case
 8834: %%
 8835: 
 8836: otp71922_err_desc(T) ->
 8837:     cre_ErrDesc(T).
 8838:

 8841: 
 8842: otp_7192_3(suite) ->
 8843:     [];
 8844: otp_7192_3(doc) ->
 8845:     ["Same as otp_7192_2 but transport is UDP instead of TCP"];
 8846: otp_7192_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8847:     Pre = fun() ->
 8848:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 8849:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 8850:                   d("start nodes: "
 8851:                     "~n      MGC Node: ~p"
 8852:                     "~n      MG Node:  ~p", 
 8853:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 8854:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
 8855:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes),
 8856:                   Nodes
 8857:           end,
 8858:     Case = fun(Nodes) -> do_otp_7192_3(Config, Nodes) end,
 8859:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 8860:                    d("stop nodes"),
 8861:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 8862:            end,
 8863:     try_tc(otp_7192_3, Pre, Case, Post).
 8864: 
 8865: do_otp_7192_3(Config,
 8866:               [MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
 8867: 
 8868:     MgMid = {deviceName,"mg"},
 8869: 
 8870:     d("[MGC] start the simulator "),
 8871:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 8872: 
 8873:     d("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
 8874:     MgcEvSeq = otp72923_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 8875:                                            text, udp, MgMid),
 8876: 
 8877:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
 8878:     sleep(1000),
 8879: 
 8880:     d("[MGC] start the simulation"),
 8881:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 8882: 
 8883:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulator"),
 8884:     sleep(1000),
 8885: 
 8886:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
 8887:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
 8888: 
 8889:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
 8890:     MgEvSeq = otp72923_mg_event_sequence(text, udp, MgMid),
 8891: 
 8892:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
 8893:     sleep(1000),
 8894: 
 8895:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
 8896:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
 8897: 
 8898:     d("await the generator(s) completion"),
 8899:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId], 60000),
 8900: 
 8901:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 8902:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 8903:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mgc),
 8904: 
 8905:     %% Tell Mg to stop
 8906:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
 8907:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
 8908: 
 8909:     i("done", []),
 8910:     ok.
 8911: 
 8912:

 8926:         {?MODULE, otp72923_mgc_verify_ack, []}).

 8928:         {?MODULE, otp72923_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect, []}).
 8929: -else.

 8933:         otp72923_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid)).

 8944: otp72923_mgc_event_sequence(Config,
 8945:                             text, udp, MgMid) ->
 8946:     CTRL = self(),
 8947:     Mid = {deviceName, "ctrl"},
 8948:     RI = [
 8949: 	  {port,             2944},
 8950: 	  {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
 8951: 	  {encoding_config,  []},
 8952: 	  {transport_module, megaco_udp}
 8953: 	 ],
 8954:     Tid = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","01101101"]},
 8955:     NR = fun(Cid, Rid) ->
 8956: 		 [otp72923_mgc_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid)]
 8957: 	 end,
 8958:     LocalConnectVerify     = ?otp72923_mgc_verify_handle_connect_fun(), 
 8959:     ServiceChangeReqVerify = ?otp72923_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid),
 8960:     NotifyReqVerify        = ?otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_req_fun(),
 8961:     NotifyReplyVerify      = ?otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_reply_fun(), 
 8962:     AckVerify              = ?otp72923_mgc_verify_ack_fun(), 
 8963:     %% DiscoVerify            = ?otp72923_mgc_verify_handle_disconnect_fun(), 
 8964:     EvSeq = [
 8965: 	     {debug, true},
 8966: 	     ?MEGACO_TRACE(Config, max), % {megaco_trace, max}, 
 8967: 	     %% {megaco_trace, disable}, 
 8968: 	     megaco_start,
 8969: 	     {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 8970: 	     start_transport,
 8971: 	     listen,
 8972: 
 8973:              %% ANNOUNCE READY
 8974:              {trigger, fun() -> CTRL ! announce_mgc end}, 
 8975: 
 8976: 	     {megaco_connect,  MgMid}, 
 8977: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_connect,       LocalConnectVerify},
 8978: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, ServiceChangeReqVerify},
 8979: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify},
 8980: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify},
 8981: 	     {megaco_callback, handle_trans_request, NotifyReqVerify},
 8982: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, request_timer,      1000},
 8983: 	     {megaco_cast, NR(1,1), []},
 8984: 
 8985: 	     {megaco_callback, [{handle_trans_ack,     3, AckVerify},
 8986: 				{handle_trans_request, 3, NotifyReqVerify},
 8987: 				{handle_trans_reply,   1, NotifyReplyVerify}]},
 8988: 	     %% {megaco_callback, handle_disconnect,    DiscoVerify},
 8989: 	     {sleep, 1000},
 8990: 	     megaco_stop_user,
 8991: 	     megaco_stop
 8992: 	    ],
 8993:     EvSeq.

 8996: otp72923_mgc_verify_handle_connect({handle_connect, CH, ?VERSION}) -> 
 8997:     io:format("otp72923_mgc_verify_handle_connect -> ok"
 8998: 	      "~n   CH: ~p~n", [CH]),
 8999:     {ok, timer:seconds(2), CH, ok};
 9000: otp72923_mgc_verify_handle_connect(Else) ->
 9001:     io:format("otp72923_mgc_verify_handle_connect -> unknown"
 9002: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 9003:     {error, Else, ok}.

 9005: otp72923_mgc_verify_service_change_req_fun(Mid) ->
 9006:     fun(Ev) ->
 9007: 	    otp72923_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Ev, Mid)
 9008:     end.
 9009: 
 9010: otp72923_mgc_verify_service_change_req(
 9011:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}, Mid) ->
 9012:     io:format("otp72923_mgc_verify_service_change_req -> ok"
 9013: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 9014:     case AR of
 9015: 	#'ActionRequest'{commandRequests = [CR]} ->
 9016: 	    case CR of
 9017: 		#'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} ->
 9018: 		    case Cmd of
 9019: 			{serviceChangeReq, 
 9020: 			 #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID = [Tid],
 9021: 						 serviceChangeParms = Parms}} ->
 9022: 			    case Tid of
 9023: 				#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, 
 9024: 						id = ["root"]} ->
 9025: 				    case Parms of
 9026: 					#'ServiceChangeParm'{
 9027: 						 serviceChangeMethod = restart,
 9028: 						 serviceChangeReason = [[$9,$0,$1|_]]} ->
 9029: 					    Reply = 
 9030: 						{discard_ack, 
 9031: 						 [otp72923_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, 1)]},
 9032: 					    {ok, AR, Reply};
 9033: 					_ ->
 9034: 					    Err = {invalid_SCP, Parms},
 9035: 					    ED = otp72923_err_desc(Parms),
 9036: 					    ErrReply = {discard_ack, 
 9037: 							ED},
 9038: 					    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 9039: 				    end;
 9040: 				_ ->
 9041: 				    Err = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 9042: 				    ED = otp72923_err_desc(Tid),
 9043: 				    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 9044: 				    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 9045: 			    end;
 9046: 			_ ->
 9047: 			    Err = {invalid_command, Cmd},
 9048: 			    ED = otp72923_err_desc(Cmd),
 9049: 			    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 9050: 			    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 9051: 		    end;
 9052: 		_ ->
 9053: 		    Err = {invalid_command_request, CR},
 9054: 		    ED = otp72923_err_desc(CR),
 9055: 		    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 9056: 		    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 9057: 	    end;
 9058: 	_ ->
 9059: 	    Err = {invalid_action_request, AR},
 9060: 	    ED = otp72923_err_desc(AR),
 9061: 	    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 9062: 	    {error, Err, ErrReply}
 9063:     end;
 9064: otp72923_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Else, _Mid) ->
 9065:     io:format("otp72923_mgc_verify_service_change_req -> unknown"
 9066: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 9067:     ED = otp72923_err_desc(Else),
 9068:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 9069:     {error, Else, ErrReply}.
 9070: 
 9071: otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_request_fun() ->
 9072:     fun(Ev) ->
 9073: 	    otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_request(Ev)
 9074:     end.

 9076: otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_request(
 9077:   {handle_trans_request, _, ?VERSION, [AR]}) ->
 9078:     io:format("otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_request -> ok"
 9079: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 9080:     case AR of
 9081: 	#'ActionRequest'{contextId = 1 = Cid, 
 9082: 			 commandRequests = [CR]} ->
 9083: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} = CR,
 9084: 	    {notifyReq, NR} = Cmd,
 9085: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID = [Tid],
 9086: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = OED,
 9087: 			     errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} = NR,
 9088: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [OE]} = OED,
 9089: 	    #'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} = OE,
 9090: 	    HandleAck = {handle_sloppy_ack, kalle},
 9091: 	    Reply = {HandleAck, 
 9092: 		     [otp72923_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, Tid)]},
 9093: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
 9094: 	#'ActionRequest'{contextId = 2 = Cid, 
 9095: 			 commandRequests = [CR]} ->
 9096: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd} = CR,
 9097: 	    {notifyReq, NR} = Cmd,
 9098: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID = [Tid],
 9099: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = OED,
 9100: 			     errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} = NR,
 9101: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [OE]} = OED,
 9102: 	    #'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} = OE,
 9103: 	    Reply = {discard_ack, [otp72923_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, Tid)]},
 9104: 	    {ok, AR, Reply};
 9105: 	_ ->
 9106: 	    ED = otp72923_err_desc(AR),
 9107: 	    ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 9108: 	    {error, AR, ErrReply}
 9109:     end;
 9110: otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_request(Else) ->
 9111:     io:format("otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_request -> unknown"
 9112: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 9113:     ED = otp72923_err_desc(Else),
 9114:     ErrReply = {discard_ack, ED},
 9115:     {error, Else, ErrReply}.
 9116: 
 9117: otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_reply({handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, 
 9118: 				 {ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
 9119:     io:format("otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_reply -> ok"
 9120: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 9121:     {ok, AR, ok};
 9122: otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_reply({handle_trans_reply, CH, ?VERSION, 
 9123: 				 UnknownResult, _}) ->
 9124:     io:format("otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_reply -> unknown result"
 9125: 	      "~n   UnknownResult: ~p~n", [UnknownResult]),
 9126:     {error, {unknown_reply_result, UnknownResult, CH}, ok};
 9127: otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_reply(Else) ->
 9128:     io:format("otp72923_mgc_verify_notify_reply -> unknown"
 9129: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 9130:     {error, {unknown_reply, Else}, ok}.

 9154: otp72923_mgc_service_change_reply_ar(Mid, Cid) ->
 9155:     SCRP  = cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid),
 9156:     SCRes = cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP),
 9157:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 9158:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReply([Root], SCRes),
 9159:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(SCR),
 9160:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).

 9170: otp72923_mgc_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tid, Cid) ->
 9171:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "44000000"),
 9172:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 9173:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 9174:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 9175:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 9176:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 9177:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).

 9180:     NR    = cre_notifyReply([TermId]),
 9181:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(NR),
 9182:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).

 9289: otp72923_mg_verify_service_change_reply({handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, 
 9290: 					{ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
 9291:     io:format("otp72923_mg_verify_service_change_reply -> ok"
 9292: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 9293:     case AR of
 9294: 	#'ActionReply'{commandReply = [SCR]} ->
 9295: 	    case SCR of
 9296: 		{serviceChangeReply,
 9297: 		 #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID = [Tid],
 9298: 				       serviceChangeResult = Res}} ->
 9299: 		    case Tid of
 9300: 			#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, 
 9301: 					id = ["root"]} ->
 9302: 			    case Res of
 9303: 				{serviceChangeResParms,
 9304: 				 #'ServiceChangeResParm'{
 9305: 				   serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid}} ->
 9306: 				    {ok, AR, ok};
 9307: 				{Tag, Val} ->
 9308: 				    Err = {invalid_service_change_result, 
 9309: 					   Tag, Val},
 9310: 				    {error, Err, ok}
 9311: 			    end;
 9312: 			_ ->
 9313: 			    Err = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 9314: 			    {error, Err, ok}
 9315: 		    end;
 9316: 		{Tag, Val} ->
 9317: 		    Err = {invalid_command_reply, Tag, Val},
 9318: 		    {error, Err, ok}
 9319: 	    end;
 9320: 	_ ->
 9321: 	    Err = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
 9322: 	    {error, Err, ok}
 9323:     end;
 9324: otp72923_mg_verify_service_change_reply(Else) ->
 9325:     io:format("otp72923_mg_verify_service_change_reply -> unknown"
 9326: 	      "~n   Else: ~p~n", [Else]),
 9327:     {error, Else, ok}.

 9562: 
 9563: await_ack(_User, 0, Timeout, _Expected) ->
 9564:     d("await_ack -> done when Timeout = ~p", [Timeout]),
 9565:     ok;
 9566: await_ack(User, N, Timeout, Expected)
 9567:   when (N > 0) andalso is_integer(Timeout) ->
 9568:     d("await_ack -> entry with N: ~p, Timeout: ~p", [N, Timeout]),
 9569:     T = tim(),
 9570:     receive
 9571: 	{ack_received, User, Expected} ->
 9572: 	    d("await_ack -> received another expected ack"),
 9573: 	    await_ack(User, N-1, Timeout - (tim() - T), Expected);
 9574: 	{ack_received, User, UnExpected} ->
 9575: 	    e("await_ack -> received unexpected ack result: ~p"
 9576:               "~n   when"
 9577:               "~n      User:      ~p"
 9578:               "~n      N:         ~p"
 9579:               "~n      Remaining: ~p",
 9580:               [UnExpected, User, N, Timeout - (tim() - T)]),
 9581: 	    exit({unexpected_ack_result, User, UnExpected, Expected})
 9582:     after Timeout ->
 9583: 	    exit({await_ack_timeout, N, User})
 9584:     end;
 9585: await_ack(User, N, infinity, Expected) when N > 0 ->
 9586:     d("await_ack -> entry with N: ~p", [N]),
 9587:     receive
 9588: 	{ack_received, User, Expected} ->
 9589: 	    d("await_ack -> received another ack"),
 9590: 	    await_ack(User, N-1, infinity, Expected);
 9591: 	{ack_received, User, UnExpected} ->
 9592: 	    e("await_ack -> unexpected ack result: ~p"
 9593:               "~n   when"
 9594:               "~n      User: ~p"
 9595:               "~n      N:    ~p", [UnExpected, User, N]),
 9596: 	    exit({unexpected_ack_result, User, UnExpected, Expected})
 9597:     end.
 9598: 
 9599: 
 9600: tim() ->
 9601:     {A,B,C} = erlang:timestamp(),
 9602:     A*1000000000+B*1000+(C div 1000).
 9603: 
 9604: 
 9605: make_node_name(Name) ->
 9606:     case string:tokens(atom_to_list(node()), [$@]) of
 9607: 	[_,Host] ->
 9608: 	    list_to_atom(lists:concat([atom_to_list(Name) ++ "@" ++ Host]));
 9609: 	_ ->
 9610: 	    exit("Test node must be started with '-sname'")
 9611:      end.
 9612: 
 9613: 
 9614: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9615: 
 9616: await_completion(Ids) ->
 9617:     case megaco_test_generator_lib:await_completion(Ids) of
 9618:         {ok, Reply} ->
 9619:             d("OK => Reply: ~n~p", [Reply]),
 9620:             ok;
 9621:         {error, Reply} ->
 9622:             e("await completion failed: "
 9623:               "~n   ~p", [Reply]),
 9624:             ?ERROR({failed, Reply})
 9625:     end.
 9626: 
 9627: await_completion(Ids, Timeout) ->
 9628:     case megaco_test_generator_lib:await_completion(Ids, Timeout) of
 9629:         {ok, Reply} ->
 9630:             d("OK => Reply: ~n~p", [Reply]),
 9631:             ok;
 9632:         {error, Reply} ->
 9633:             e("await completion failed: "
 9634:               "~n   ~p"
 9635:               "~n   ~p", [Timeout, Reply]),
 9636:             ?ERROR({failed, Reply})
 9637:     end.

 9641: 
 9642: mgc_start(Pid, Mid, ET, Verb) ->
 9643:     try ?MGC:start(Pid, Mid, ET, Verb) of
 9644:         {ok, MGC} ->
 9645:             MGC;
 9646:         {error, StartReason} ->
 9647:             e("failed starting mgc (error): "
 9648:               "~n      ~p", [StartReason]),
 9649:             ?SKIP({failed_starting, mgc, StartReason})
 9650:     catch
 9651:         exit:{error, timeout} ->
 9652:             e("failed starting mgc (exit): timeout"),
 9653:             ?SKIP({failed_starting, mgc, timeout});
 9654:         exit:{failed_starting, _, StartExitReason} ->
 9655:             e("failed starting mgc (exit): "
 9656:               "~n      ~p", [StartExitReason]),
 9657:             ?SKIP({failed_starting, mgc, StartExitReason})
 9658:     end.
 9659:     
 9660: 
 9661: mg_start(Pid, Mid, Enc, Transp, Conf, Verb) ->
 9662:     try ?MG:start(Pid, Mid, Enc, Transp, Conf, Verb) of
 9663:         {ok, MG} ->
 9664:             MG; 
 9665:         {error, Reason} ->
 9666:             e("failed starting mg (error): "
 9667:               "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 9668:             ?SKIP({failed_starting, mgc, Reason})
 9669:     catch
 9670:         exit:{error, timeout} ->
 9671:             e("failed starting mg (exit): timeout"),
 9672:             ?SKIP({failed_starting, mg, timeout});
 9673:         exit:{failed_starting, _, ExitReason} ->
 9674:             e("failed starting mg (exit): "
 9675:               "~n      ~p", [ExitReason]),
 9676:             ?SKIP({failed_starting, mg, ExitReason})
 9677:     end.
 9678: 
 9679:     
 9680: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9681: 
 9682: try_tc(TCName, Pre, Case, Post) when is_atom(TCName)      andalso
 9683:                                      is_function(Pre,  0) andalso
 9684:                                      is_function(Case, 1) andalso
 9685:                                      is_function(Post, 1) ->
 9686:     try_tc(TCName, "TEST", ?TEST_VERBOSITY, Pre, Case, Post).
 9687: 
 9688: try_tc(TCName, Cond, Pre, Case, Post) when is_atom(TCName)      andalso
 9689:                                            is_function(Cond, 0) andalso
 9690:                                            is_function(Pre,  0) andalso
 9691:                                            is_function(Case, 1) andalso
 9692:                                            is_function(Post, 1) ->
 9693:     try_tc(TCName, "TEST", ?TEST_VERBOSITY, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 9694: 
 9695: try_tc(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Pre, Case, Post) ->
 9696:     ?TRY_TC(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Pre, Case, Post).
 9697: 
 9698: try_tc(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Cond, Pre, Case, Post) ->
 9699:     ?TRY_TC(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 9700: 
 9701: 
 9702: 
 9703: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9704: 
 9705: sleep(X) -> receive after X -> ok end.
 9706: 
 9707: %% error_msg(F,A) -> error_logger:error_msg(F ++ "~n",A).
 9708: 
 9709: 
 9710: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9711: 
 9712: p(F, A) ->
 9713:     io:format("*** [~s] ~p ***"
 9714: 	      "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
 9715: 	      [?FTS(), self() | A]).
 9716: 
 9717: e(F) ->
 9718:     e(F, []).
 9719: 
 9720: e(F, A) ->
 9721:     print(error, "ERROR", F, A).
 9722: 
 9723: 
 9724: i(F) ->
 9725:     i(F, []).
 9726: 
 9727: i(F, A) ->
 9728:     print(info, "INFO", F, A).
 9729: 
 9730: 
 9731: d(F) ->
 9732:     d(F, []).
 9733: 
 9734: d(F, A) ->
 9735:     print(debug, "DBG", F, A).
 9736: 
 9737: 
 9738: print(Severity, P, F, A) ->
 9739:     print2(printable(Severity), P, F, A).
 9740: 
 9741: printable(Sev) ->
 9742:     printable(Sev, get(verbosity)).
 9743: 
 9744: printable(_,     debug) -> true;
 9745: printable(info,  info)  -> true;
 9746: printable(error, _)     -> true;
 9747: printable(_,_)          -> false.
 9748: 
 9749: print2(true, P, F, A) ->
 9750:     S  = ?F("*** [~s] ~s ~p~s ***"
 9751:             "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n"
 9752:             "~n", [?FTS(), P, self(), case get(tc) of
 9753:                                           undefined -> "";
 9754:                                           TC -> " " ++ atom_to_list(TC)
 9755:                                       end | A]),
 9756:     io:format("~s", [S]);
 9757: print2(_, _, _, _) ->
 9758:     ok.
 9759: 
 9760:
